variations.template: <target> can't be the target<number:plural:s> of spells or abilities.
rts: It can't be the target of spells or abilities.
You can't be the target of spells or abilities.
They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.
This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.
This enchantment can't be the target of spells or abilities.
A creature with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.

variations.template: A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.
rts: A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.

variations.template: {S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source. A creature with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.
rts: {S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source. A creature with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.
